title: Stuffing
ingredients: 1 lb crusty bread, cubed and dried
steps: Dry bread cubes in oven 15 minutes if not already stale.
Melt butter. Cook onion and celery until soft, 8 minutes.
Add garlic, sage, thyme. Cook 1 minute. Season.
Combine bread, vegetables, broth, eggs. Toss well.
Transfer to dish. Cover with foil.
Bake 30 minutes covered. Uncover, bake 20 more minutes until golden.
notes: Fresh herbs make a huge difference.
